personas_with_mappings.persona_name: US Enterprise B2B SaaS - Product Ops

mappings.pain_point: Product and release managers (50–200 contributors) miss release deadlines due to fragmented planning tools, delaying time-to-revenue and creating customer churn risk.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management centralizes release plans and automates status updates, reducing release delays by ~30% and saving ~8 hours/week across PMs by removing manual coordination.

mappings.pain_point: Engineering leads waste cycles hunting specs, tickets, and decisions across docs and trackers, lowering sprint velocity and extending delivery timelines.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management links tasks, docs, and Jira issues in one view to cut context-switching and increase sprint velocity by ~15% through consolidated workfeeds.

mappings.pain_point: Cross-functional dependencies are invisible to product ops, causing scope creep, blocked work, and unplanned rework that inflates project costs.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management visualizes dependencies and triggers automated alerts, reducing blocked work by ~40% and lowering rework costs with proactive coordination.

mappings.pain_point: Scaling consistent release governance across 50–200 contributors creates audit and compliance risks and adds heavy manual review time.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management enforces templates, approvals, and audit trails to standardize processes and cut compliance prep time by up to 50% with built-in governance.

mappings.pain_point: Product ops lack clear capacity data, leading to over-allocated teams, missed priorities, and delayed feature launches impacting ARR growth.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management's workload and capacity views optimize resource allocation, improving on-time delivery by ~25% and reducing over-allocation across squads.

personas_with_mappings.persona_name: US Enterprise Public Sector - IT Programs

mappings.pain_point: Program directors in large agencies (100–500 staff) struggle with siloed project trackers, causing missed milestones on multi-year IT contracts and risking penalty clauses.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management centralizes program plans and milestone tracking, improving milestone adherence by ~35% and reducing contract risk through one source of truth.

mappings.pain_point: Compliance and audit teams spend excessive time compiling evidence from disparate systems, delaying audit responses and increasing review costs.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management provides auditable task histories and standardized templates to cut audit prep time by ~50% and accelerate evidence collection.

mappings.pain_point: Cross-agency initiatives suffer from slow stakeholder alignment and long approval cycles, delaying RFP responses and program rollouts.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management automates approval flows and stakeholder notifications, shortening decision cycles and speeding RFP and rollout timelines by ~40%.

mappings.pain_point: IT program managers face security and SSO integration hurdles during procurement, prolonging deployments and increasing vendor management overhead.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management integrates with enterprise SSO and provisioning (Okta) and enterprise controls to cut deployment time and lower vendor onboarding effort by ~30%.

mappings.pain_point: Large teams lack consolidated program visibility, leading to duplicate work and inefficient budget use across agencies.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management consolidates cross-program status and budgets into dashboards so leaders reduce duplicate work and improve budget visibility by ~45%.

personas_with_mappings.persona_name: North America Mid-Market Marketing Agencies - Creative Ops

mappings.pain_point: Creative directors and account managers (10–60 people) lose billable hours to messy intake and unclear briefs, shrinking margins and delaying client deliveries.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management standardizes intake with templates and automated prioritization, cutting intake-to-brief time by ~50% and reclaiming billable hours.

mappings.pain_point: Art and production teams face long review cycles with version confusion, causing missed launch dates and client dissatisfaction.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management centralizes proofs, feedback, and version history to reduce review cycles by ~60% and speed time-to-delivery.

mappings.pain_point: Ops leads lack visibility into team capacity, resulting in overbooked creatives, missed SLAs, and uneven profitability across accounts.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management's workload views balance assignments and forecast capacity, improving SLA adherence and profitability by ~20%.

mappings.pain_point: Account teams spend hours in email chasing approvals from clients, increasing turnaround time and stagnating campaign momentum.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management automates approval requests and client-facing tasks, cutting approval turnaround by ~40% and accelerating campaign launches.

mappings.pain_point: Operations leaders coordinating multi-site production (50–200 staff) experience launch delays from disconnected plans, increasing time-to-market and inventory costs.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management centralizes production schedules and supplier tasks, reducing launch delays by ~30% and lowering excess inventory through synchronized plans.

mappings.pain_point: Supply chain managers waste time tracking supplier status across emails and spreadsheets, causing parts shortages and line stoppages that drive up costs.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management consolidates supplier workflows and automates status updates, cutting supplier follow-up time and reducing line stoppages by ~35%.

mappings.pain_point: Quality and change control processes are manual and inconsistent, increasing defect rates and recall risk across manufacturing sites.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management enforces change-control templates and approval gates to reduce defects and streamline corrective actions, lowering rework costs.

mappings.pain_point: Plant managers lack cross-site visibility into uptime and priorities, leading to inefficient maintenance scheduling and unexpected downtime.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management surfaces cross-site priorities and maintenance schedules so teams cut unplanned downtime and improve uptime predictability.

personas_with_mappings.persona_name: UK Large Healthcare - Clinical Operations Leaders

mappings.pain_point: Clinical operations leaders (100–500 staff) face delayed patient discharges due to poor cross-disciplinary task coordination, increasing bed occupancy and cost per patient.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management coordinates care plans and discharge tasks across teams, reducing discharge delays and lowering average length-of-stay metrics.

mappings.pain_point: Compliance and clinical audit teams spend weeks consolidating evidence from disconnected systems, risking regulatory fines and slow inspections.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management provides auditable task histories and standardized clinical templates to cut audit prep time by ~50% and speed inspections.

mappings.pain_point: Operational leaders lack real-time visibility into capacity and staffing, causing clinic bottlenecks and cancelled procedures that hit revenue and patient satisfaction.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management's capacity and scheduling views surface real-time constraints so leaders reduce bottlenecks and improve clinic utilization.

mappings.pain_point: Multi-disciplinary projects (pathway redesign, digital rollouts) stall because project tasks and approvals are scattered, delaying service improvements.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management centralizes project plans, automates approvals, and integrates with EHR and comms tools to accelerate delivery of clinical initiatives.
